explains: adj. 短暂的，短期的；短命的；无常的

sentences.en: Her sense of triumph was short-lived.
sentences.cn: 她喜悦的感觉是短暂的。

sentences.en: With luck, this will be short-lived.
sentences.cn: 幸运的话，这种情况将是短暂的。

sentences.en: And the rises were short-lived: prices typically returned to normal with the next harvest.
sentences.cn: 而且价格上涨是短暂的：价格通常在下一次收获后回归正常。
